mapper.select: select o.order_no orderNo, o.people people, to_char(o.order_date, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi') orderDate, o.order_status orderStatus, o.delivery_m_adr deliveryMAdr, o.delivery_s_adr deliverySAdr, o.delivery_req deliveryReq, p.countPeople, case when o.order_date <= sysdate then 1 else 0 end redText from order_group o, (select order_no, count(*) countPeople from personal_order group by order_no) p where o.order_no = p.order_no and o.store_no = #{storeNo} order by o.order_date asc, o.order_no asc
select store_name storeName, on_off onOff, store_no storeNo, min_price minPrice from business where store_no = #{storeNo}

select d.fee pFee, u.main_address deliveryMAdr, u.sub_address deliverySAdr from delivery d , user_adr u where d.store_no = #{storeNo} and u.no = #{No} and u.default_address =1 and u.main_address like '%'||d.delivery_area||'%'
select menu_cate_no menuCateNo, store_no storeNo, menu_cate_name menuCateName from menu_cate where store_no = #{storeNo} order by menu_cate_no asc

select m.menu_no menuNo, m.menu_cate_no menuCateNo, m.menu_name menuImg, m.menu_name menuName, m.menu_price menuPrice, m.menu_desc menuDesc from menu_cate mc, menu m where mc.menu_cate_no = m.menu_cate_no and mc.store_no = #{storeNo} order by menu_no asc

select m.menu_no menuNo, m.menu_name menuImg, m.menu_name menuName, m.menu_price menuPrice, m.menu_desc menuDesc from menu_cate mc, menu m where mc.menu_cate_no = m.menu_cate_no and mc.store_no = #{storeNo} and m.menu_no = #{menuNo}

select moc.option_cate_no optionCateNo, moc.menu_no menuNo, moc.option_cate_name optionCateName, moc.chk_rdo chkRdo from menu_cate mc, menu m, menu_option_cate moc where mc.menu_cate_no = m.menu_cate_no and m.menu_no = moc.menu_no and mc.store_no = #{storeNo} and m.menu_no = #{menuNo} order by moc.option_cate_no asc

select oco.option_cate_no optionCateNo, mo.option_no optionNo, mo.option_name optionName, mo.option_price optionPrice, mo.store_no storeNo, moc.menu_no menuNo from op_cate_op oco, menu_option mo, menu_option_cate moc where oco.option_no = mo.option_no and oco.option_cate_no = moc.option_cate_no and mo.store_no = #{storeNo} and moc.menu_no = #{menuNo} order by mo.option_no asc
mapper.insert:
select seq_order_group.nextval from dual
insert into order_group(order_no, store_no, people, order_date, order_status, delivery_m_adr, delivery_req) values (#{orderNo}, #{storeNo}, #{people}, TO_DATE(#{orderDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 0, #{address}, #{deliveryReq})
